@description.name: @description
@description.body: A basic decorator featuring simple borders based on CSS styles. This mixin is usually used by {@link qx.ui.decoration.Decorator}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: top width of border

@description.body: right width of border

@description.body: Property group to configure the left border

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Property group to configure the right border

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Property group to configure the top border

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Property group to configure the bottom border

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Property group to set the border width of all sides

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Property group to set the border style of all sides

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Property group to set the border color of all sides

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Takes a styles map and adds the border styles styles in place to the given map. This is the needed behavior for {@link qx.ui.decoration.Decorator}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: styles {Map} A map to add the styles.
@param.description: A map to add the styles.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Implementation of the interface for the single border.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property widthTop. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #widthTop}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property widthTop. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #widthTop}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property widthTop. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #widthTop}.
